dataList.title: Мотылёк алых лепестков
dataList.eventDesc:
Тёмная тень затаилась в центре пылающего мотылька.

Её форма была смутной и изменчивой, но... как-то можно сказать, что тень — это само ядро мотылька.

Если бы эту тень можно было отделить от пламени, возможно, его жар на мгновение утих бы.
successDesc:
{0} тянется к пламени, терпя обжигающий огонь.

На кончиках пальцев начинают вздуваться волдыри, но, возможно, страсть {0}(а/и) горела жарче самого пламени.

Прежде чем мотылёк успел что-либо сделать, {0} вырывает тёмную сущность из пламени и отшвыривает её прочь от огня.

Огонь и угли как на мотыльке, так и на Грешниках немедленно утихли.

Словно пламя никогда и не горело.
failureDesc:
{0} тянется к пламени, терпя обжигающий огонь.

Но боль от того, что сама кожа вздувалась волдырями от жара, была слишком невыносимой. {0} отдёргивает руку от пламени, прежде чем достигает тени.

Цена упущенной возможности была разрушительной.

Мотылёк начинает бить крыльями быстрее и с невиданной силой; а пламя в ответ начало подниматься всё выше и выше.

Не нужно говорить, что вскоре на Грешников обрушился мир огня.

dataList.title: Rose Hunter
dataList.prevDesc: The Rose Hunter expertly swings the Barbed Lasso over his head.
dataList.eventDesc:
The lasso is aiming straight for us...

The lasso, powered on by the hunter's movements, flies right at us.
successDesc:
With lightning-fast reflexes, {0} deflects the barbed lasso to the side.

The lasso, deflected, flies in the other direction.

The Rose Hunter hesitates, surprised by the turn of events.
failureDesc:
The barbed lasso struck {0} hard.

Watching the Sinner writhing in pain seems to have invigorated the Rose Hunter.

dataList.title: Faelantern
dataList.prevDesc: The teal-colored fairy appeared again at the tip of the branch.
dataList.eventDesc:
Attacking that fairy again will reveal its true form.

This isn’t your first time facing this entity. It won’t be as hard as the first time.

The Sinners seem to agree.

The fairy simply sat there in near complete stillness, only interrupted by its intermittently vibrating wings. It was as though the fairy knew you were coming.
successDesc:
[{0}] charged toward the fairy.

After a light leap into the air, the Sinner swung the weapon toward the fairy.

”!!!”

The fairy appeared to scream, but no sound came from its mouth.

Maybe it wasn’t screaming at all. Perhaps it was just the swaying of branches.

”The eyes are coming out…”

”Get outta there! Here we go again.”

Numerous eyes open one by one, gleaming from the shadows.

They oscillate as though they’ll jump out at us at any minute.

So… What now?
failureDesc:
[{0}] charged toward the fairy.

After lightly leaping into the air, the Sinner swung the weapon toward the fairy.

But…

”That thing can dodge…?!”

Of course, it wasn’t going to be that easy. Assuming that a bait would remain stationary is a complacent thought.

The fairy had also lightly flown up into the air and glared at the Sinner, who dared to attack it.

”G-get out of there! It’s starting to move again!”

[{0}] tried to get away, but its main body had already tightened around the Sinner's legs.

So… What now?

dataList.title: Wayward Passenger
dataList.prevDesc: Is it hiding in another dimension again?
dataList.eventDesc:
If this fight’s been anything to go by, it’ll soon emerge from one of the dimensional rifts.

If we can intuit its next point of emergence, maybe we can deal a fatal blow against it before it fully emerges from the dimensional rift.
dataList.behaveDesc: Who can intuit its next point of emergence?
successDesc:
Soon, the entity began crawling out of the dimensional rift that [{0}] selected.

"!"

Though it sensed the Sinner’s presence before it emerged,

It didn’t have enough time to act before [{0}] swung their weapon at it.

The entity hurriedly closed the dimensional rift as it fled back into its safety. That seems to have destabilized the dimensional rift.

Opportunity.
failureDesc:
Soon, the entity began to crawl out of the dimensional rift.

… From the rift opposite to the one that [{0}] had selected, unfortunately.

[{0}] quickly turned around, brandishing their weapon… but the entity was faster.

It goes without saying that a powerful attack soon struck the Sinner.

dataList.prevDesc: A bear plush looks at us with a sad expression. Several sharp nails are impaling its body.

successDesc:
{0} gave the bear plush a hug.

Even as its nails dig into {0}'s skin...

... the happily bouncing bear plush seemed to have soothed the Sinner's feelings.
failureDesc:
{0} gave the bear plush a hug.

A particularly blunt nail digs into {0}'s skin...

... the happily bouncing bear plush seemed to have soothed the Sinner's feelings.
